predicate.note: Frames file for 'disengage' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.1.

roleset.name: remove, take out of or off

example.name: all args
example.text: New York is in the process of [*-1] trying [*-2] to disengage itself from a 20-year-old commitment to this system of school governance, even as Chicago and other cities are moving to institute it.
example.arg: a 20-year-old commitment to this system of school governance
